metadata.synopsis: Crossbow-armed Brenda (Linda Blair) hunts down a Hollywood gang led by a punk (Robert Dryer) with a razor-blade earring.

reviews: Blair still manages to become a cinematic heroine - a formidable woman in the midst of a misogynistic jumble.
Say what you will about over-the-top enthusiasm in movies like these, here is a woman who is comfortable chewing the scenery until she is licking her lips in satisfaction.
One of my favorite Linda Blair Trash fests...
